mapper.select: SELECT ORDERS_NUM, SALES_DATE, amount, Pro_Code, User_Id, ORDERS_NUM FROM SALES
SELECT ORDERS_NUM, TO_CHAR(sales_Date, 'YYYY-MM') AS date, SUM(amount) AS amount, Pro_Code, User_Id FROM SALES GROUP BY TO_CHAR(sales_Date, 'YYYY-MM'), Pro_Code, User_Id
SELECT sales_Date, ORDERS_NUM, SUM(amount) AS amount, Pro_Code, User_Id FROM SALES WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sales_Date) = #{year} GROUP BY sales_Date, Pro_Code, User_Id, ORDERS_NUM
SELECT User_Id, ORDERS_NUM, amount, sales_Date, Pro_Code FROM SALES WHERE User_Id LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%' ORDER BY sales_Date DESC

SELECT User_Id, User_Name, User_Email, User_Address, User_Phone, User_Mileage FROM USERS WHERE
User_Id LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
User_Name LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
User_Phone LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
